A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: just awful\, breaks all the old characters and makes them look selfish or bitter or just goofy. and the new characters is either a mary sue or a space janitor that effectively adds nothing of consequence to anything. no seriously anything he tries to do to help doesnt help\, he ends up getting captured and gets busted out by movie magic\, like a code breaker being in the cell next door\, or a ship going into hyper space as he is about to get killed. but honestly these movies are a huge let down\, to see there was absolutely no plan whatsoever with this franchise reallly shocks me with how well the marvel universe has been managed.
